```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# ガントチャート風のデータ
df = pd.DataFrame({
    'Task': ['Planning', 'Development', 'Testing', 'Deploy'],
    'Start': [1, 3, 6, 8],
    'Duration': [2, 3, 2, 1]
})

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 4))
plt.barh(df['Task'], df['Duration'], left=df['Start'], color='skyblue')
plt.xlabel('Week')
plt.grid(axis='x', linestyle='--')
plt.title('Project Schedule')
plt.show()
```
